meanings.sent1: The farmer dehorned the cow to keep it safe.
meanings.sent2: The vet dehorned the rhinoceros to prevent injuries.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goat wished it could dehorn itself to avoid getting stuck in the fence.
meanings.sent4: After the storm, the landscape looked dehorned, with trees stripped of their branches.
meanings.sent5: The act of dehorning the bull was done swiftly and efficiently.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, the farmer dehorned the cattle in the barn.
meanings.sent2: The rancher dehorned the buffalo last week.
meanings.sent3: The dehorned deer felt relieved to have a lighter head.
meanings.sent4: The dehorned goat stood out among the herd, looking different.
meanings.sent5: The dehorned animals peacefully grazed in the meadow.
